events.title: Annual Science Exhibition
events.description: Student projects showcasing scientific innovation and research.
events.details: The Annual Science Exhibition showcases innovative projects from students across all grades. Parents and community members are invited to view and appreciate the scientific achievements of our students.
activities: Special guest lectures from leading scientists

events.title: Parent-Teacher Conference
events.description: End of term progress reports and consultation with teachers.
events.details: The end-of-term Parent-Teacher Conference provides an opportunity for parents to meet with teachers to discuss their child's academic progress, behavior, and development.

events.title: Cultural Arts Festival
events.description: Celebrating diverse cultures through music, dance, and art.
events.details: Join us for a celebration of diversity through cultural performances, art displays, and interactive activities that showcase traditions from around the world.

events.title: Sports Day Preparation
events.description: Practice session for annual sports day competitions.
events.details: This is a practice session for all students participating in the upcoming annual Sports Day event. Students will rehearse various track and field events, team sports, and march-past formations.

events.title: Mathematics Olympiad
events.description: Annual mathematics competition for students in grades 6-12.
events.details: The Mathematics Olympiad challenges students to solve complex mathematical problems, promoting analytical thinking and mathematical creativity among our students.

events.title: Early Years Art Exhibition
events.description: Showcasing artwork created by students in kindergarten through grade 2.
events.details: This exhibition highlights the creativity and artistic development of our youngest students, showcasing their paintings, crafts, and sculptures created throughout the academic year.
activities: Art display from kindergarten through grade 2

events.title: Annual Charity Fundraiser
events.description: Our annual charity fundraiser was a tremendous success, raising over â‚¹3 lakh for local orphanages.
events.details: The Annual Charity Fundraiser brought our school community together to support local orphanages through various activities and donation drives.

events.title: Literary Festival
events.description: Students participated enthusiastically in poetry recitals, debates and creative writing competitions.
events.details: The Literary Festival celebrated the power of language through various competitions and activities, showcasing our students' verbal and written communication skills.

events.title: Science Symposium
events.description: Renowned scientist Dr. Ramesh Kumar attended our Science Symposium and inspired our future scientists.
events.details: The Science Symposium provided a platform for science enthusiasts to interact with expert scientists and learn about recent developments in various scientific fields.

events.title: School Founder's Day
events.description: Celebration of our school's founding anniversary with special programs and alumni gathering.
events.details: Founder's Day honors the establishment of Al-Ameen School with commemorative events, alumni reunions, and special recognition of the school's heritage and achievements.

events.title: Career Guidance Workshop
events.description: Guidance session for high school students on career options and university admissions.
events.details: The Career Guidance Workshop provides valuable information to high school students about various career paths, university admission processes, and scholarship opportunities.

events.title: Annual Field Trip
events.description: Educational excursion for junior classes to the Science Museum and Planetarium.
events.details: The Annual Field Trip offers students an opportunity to learn outside the classroom environment, exploring scientific concepts through interactive exhibits and planetarium shows.

holidays.title: Eid al-Fitr
holidays.description: School closed in observance of Eid al-Fitr.

holidays.title: Independence Day
holidays.description: School closed for Independence Day. Flag hoisting ceremony at 8:00 AM.
